Class OrderInvoiceManager

extends Object
implements Serializable

    • Field Detail

      • orderInvoices

        private Vector<OrderInvoice> orderInvoices
        List of Order Invoices, implemented in Vector data structure. Each entry consists of reference to existing OrderInvoice object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OrderInvoiceManager

        public OrderInvoiceManager()
        Construct the Order Invoice Manager initialized with empty list of order invoice.

    • Method Detail

      • createOrderInvoice

        public OrderInvoice createOrderInvoice(Order order,
                              boolean membership,
                              int tableId)
        This method will evoke the creation of OrderInvoice. Each of the newly created OrderInvoice will be appended to the list of order invoices orderInvoices
        Parameters:
        order - is the Order object that Customer requested
        membership - specify whether the Customer is a member of the Restaurant
        tableId - is the table identifier (table number) corresponds to which table the Order is requested.
        Returns:
        Returns the id of this table (table number).

      • getOrderInvoices

        public Vector<OrderInvoice> getOrderInvoices()
        This method will return the list of OrderInvoice objects
        Returns:
        orderInvoices which are the list of order invoices exist in the restaurant
